attributes.action: Legalise private e scooter on pavement and road
attributes.background: What is point of e scooter being illegal what would be point of buying one electric bike are okay but not e scooter

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Legalise use of personal e-scooters with licence, insurance and safety clothing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624041

Legalise use of electric scooters on public highways for driving licence holders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630483
